summary: Website/dashboard UI enhancement requested: make site more elaborate and adjust top navigation (Home/About/Service/Contact) positioning and styling.

existing_features.title: Update the desktop header navigation so the Home/About/Services/Contact menu is positioned on the top-right side of the header (to the right of the logo) and appears slightly larger than it is now.

Change the Home/About/Services/Contact navigation to a clear "link mode" presentation: links should look and behave like navigation links (not button-like), including hover styling and an active/selected state that reflects the currently viewed section while scrolling.

Make the overall website more elaborate while keeping the same single-page structure and the same top-level sections (Home, About, Services, Contact), by enhancing visual hierarchy, spacing, and section presentation (e.g., improved hero composition, section separators/background treatments, and more polished card/typography rhythm).
Apply one cohesive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, layout accents) and enforce it consistently across header, sections, and footer.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enhance website layout: create a more elaborate site and move Home/About/Service/Contact navigation to the top-right of the dashboard/header, slightly larger, styled as links (link mode).

projectName: Enhance website layout and adjust top-right navigation link styling
